document_data.name: Equinis
document_data.mainbody: '''Equinis''' was an [[eladrin]] ritualist in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1479 DR, Equinis went into [[Undermountain]] in search of magical knowledge. However, he was captured by [[lizardfolk]] followers of [[Sess'innek]] who wanted to use him as a sacrifice to summon an avatar of their god.
document_data.Skills: Equinis had a great knowledge of rituals and arcane lore.
